Avondale.Tolleson Union High School District:
The Tolleson Union High School District is a high school district located in the city of Tolleson, Arizona.


== Schools ==
Copper Canyon High School
La Joya Community High School
Sierra Linda High School
Tolleson Union High School
Westview High School
Lighthouse Academy, an alternative to long-term suspension.
James A. Green Continuing Education Academy, school for special needs students.
